title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t0.0
text: Skin care products are inherently physical, not virtual.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t5.0
text: How can companies use AI to help make choosing skin care products possible online?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t10.0
text: Find out on today's episode.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t13.0
text: I am Soumya Ghatpati from Estee Lauder and you're listening to me, myself, and AI.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t21.0
text: Welcome to Me, Myself, and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t27.0
text: Each episode, we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t30.0
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, professor of analytics at Boston College.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t34.0
text: I'm also the AI and business strategy guest editor at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t40.0
text: And I'm Shervin Khodobande, senior partner with BCG, and I co-lead BCG's AI practice in North America.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t47.0
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching and publishing on AI for six years,

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t53.0
text: interviewing hundreds of practitioners and surveying thousands of companies

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t57.0
text: on what it takes to build and to deploy and scale AI capabilities

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t61.0
text: and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t64.0
text: Shervin and I are excited today to be talking with Soumya Ghatpati,

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t68.0
text: head of global supply chain technology for Estee Lauder.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t71.0
text: Soumya, thanks for taking the time to talk with us. Welcome.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t74.0
text: Glad to be here. I'm really excited to be here talking about AI, one of my favorite topics.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t80.0
text: Yeah, great to have you.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t82.0
text: Let's start with your current role at Estee Lauder. What do you do now?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t86.0
text: I've been with Estee for about two and a half years.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t89.0
text: We are a prestige and luxury beauty brand company, and we have around 30 brands under our umbrella.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t98.0
text: Estee Lauder being the flagship brand, but we also have Clinique, MAC, Lumiere, several others.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t106.0
text: We are a global company with our products across all various regions from Asia to Northeast and Latin America, Europe and everywhere.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t117.0
text: I'm responsible for global supply chain technology.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t120.0
text: So I am responsible for the technology that powers the entire supply chain globally.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t126.0
text: That includes inventory, supply, demand planning, manufacturing, distribution centers,

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t132.0
text: fulfillment, transportation, end to end supply chain, all the technology capabilities that support that.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t140.0
text: All right. I didn't hear anything about artificial intelligence in that, though.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t143.0
text: So how does artificial intelligence connect with that supply chain?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t148.0
text: I took the supply chain role just about four months ago.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t151.0
text: So prior to that, I was responsible for brand technology for the Estee Lauder brand.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t158.0
text: That was really where I was directly involved in a lot of AI applications.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t164.0
text: How we use AI at Estee Lauder, starting with the consumer experience, how we're enhancing our consumer experience with the AI technology and providing real life applications, which I can talk to a little bit with the virtual try on and so on and so forth.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t179.0
text: And then personalization is a very important area in the application if AI is very significant.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t184.0
text: And then AI is also being used to create new products such as skin care and fragrance.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t190.0
text: This is where you can use data to inform ourselves on what kind of ingredients and what type of products that people like.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t197.0
text: And so we can inform our product planning using AI and what I call agile enterprise.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t204.0
text: So there are a number of areas where AI is applied to run an efficient organization such as supply chain and R&D.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t211.0
text: These are all various areas that we're using AI in.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t215.0
text: Sounds it's quite prevalent across the whole value chain.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t219.0
text: I did read up on something, I think a talk you'd given on how AI is being used to help personalize the fragrance. Is that right?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t230.0
text: That's right. Yeah.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t232.0
text: Can you comment on that a bit?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t233.0
text: Absolutely.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t234.0
text: That's definitely one of my most exciting projects that I worked on.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t239.0
text: It's an industry breakthrough, so I feel very proud about it.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t244.0
text: It's a fragrance recommendation engine, but it takes advantage of neuroscience and AI and olfactory science.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t252.0
text: We are bringing all three sciences together to make that happen.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t255.0
text: You know, human brain has approximately 400 olfactory receptors,

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t262.0
text: and we are working with a company that can actually replicate those receptors in a lab environment.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t269.0
text: So if you take a particular fragrance, we can actually tell which olfactory receptors in your brain are activated by that fragrance.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t279.0
text: So are these like neuromorphic chips or are these silicon based software?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t284.0
text: It's not a software. These are actually biosensor testing.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t289.0
text: That's pretty cool.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t290.0
text: Yeah, it's really cool. So we would be able to tell receptor 67 and 92 and 86 are triggered by this particular fragrance.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t300.0
text: And let's say that fragrance is predominantly lavender based.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t305.0
text: By the way, your brain can't really tell the difference between lavender and woody.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t309.0
text: So I might be able to bring woody fragrance to you and same receptors might get triggered because they are evoking the same emotion in your brain.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t317.0
text: So because same receptors are being triggered, we can tell, oh, by the way, just because you love lavender, you might like this other fragrance that may be woody, which smell totally different, but they have the same effect on your brain or they trigger same emotional reaction in your brain.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t335.0
text: That's very cool. And that's live?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t338.0
text: That's live. Yeah. We are piloting that in China right now, and we're trying to expand it to other areas as well.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t345.0
text: The way we implemented it, it's interesting because we started off with online because selling fragrance online is very difficult because you can't how do you smell?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t354.0
text: Right. At least we haven't we don't have that technology yet, maybe 10 years from now.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t359.0
text: But this is why we came up with this technology to see maybe can we use facial recognition and the facial recognition can identify the emotion that you're feeling based on very subtle changes in your face when you smell it.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t373.0
text: And based on that, we can recognize how you're reacting to each of those fragrances. You get a score.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t378.0
text: And based on that, we could tell whether you liked or didn't like it or moderately on a scale of one to 10, how you're liking it.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t385.0
text: And we use that data.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t390.0
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and AI. Our show is able to continue in large part due to listener support.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t395.0
text: Your streams and downloads make a big difference.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t398.0
text: If you have a moment, please consider leaving us an Apple podcast review or a rating on Spotify and share a show with others you think might find it interesting and helpful.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t412.0
text: So as a customer, you're looking at my facial recognition and then deciding what's the right fragrance for me.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t420.0
text: Correct.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t421.0
text: One of the things that Sam and I have been probing into over the last several years is the collaboration between human and AI and how it is so much more accretive, that collaboration to the pure tech or the pure human and how they complement each other.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t440.0
text: And it seems to me that fragrance and makeup and these things are so personal.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t447.0
text: And I have to imagine that in the AI solutions you talked about, there must be or should be a fair amount of human intervention or collaboration.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t459.0
text: Can you comment on any of that?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t461.0
text: I get the recommender systems and how it works and the receptors and all that.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t467.0
text: But is there a human side to this as well that maybe the experts and maybe the customers are interacting with the recommendations of AI and adapting it?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t479.0
text: Absolutely.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t481.0
text: Historically, when you try lipstick, how many can you try?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t485.0
text: Maybe three, four, five.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t486.0
text: You can't do more than that because after a while the skin starts drying up and it's uncomfortable.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t492.0
text: But now with virtual try-on capability, you could try 30 shades of lipstick in 30 seconds.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t498.0
text: Same thing with foundation.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t500.0
text: We have 56 shades of foundation, which are so slightly different.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t507.0
text: We take pride in providing high touch service and in each of our stores we have beauty advisors.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t513.0
text: Their job is to work with the customer and recommend various foundation, lipstick, etc.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t520.0
text: How do you try so many different foundations?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t523.0
text: You can't, whereas AI can narrow it down for you.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t526.0
text: These virtual try-on applications can narrow it down to two or three.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t530.0
text: From there, beauty advisor can actually work with the customer.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t533.0
text: So beauty advisor is there to help them choose what actually looks better and have that conversation and also explain why I recommend this for your skin based on the results that you want to achieve, whether it be acne or dryness, etc.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t549.0
text: So we don't see that going away, that human-machine interaction.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t554.0
text: It'll always be there.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t557.0
text: Is there a feedback loop whereby the machine gets smarter?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t562.0
text: For example, the beauty advisor says this or the customer, now you've narrowed down from 60 shades to three.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t571.0
text: But based on the final choice they make, I assume the algorithms are getting smarter from that interaction as well?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t578.0
text: Yes, absolutely.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t580.0
text: There are two ways it happens.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t582.0
text: One is we have a consumer data platform that has information about what you previously bought, what you liked, what your situation is, etc.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t592.0
text: So it feeds into that so that next time when you come into the store or when you interact with us, we can say, hey, by the way, last time you bought this.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t600.0
text: So I can resolve that for you or I would recommend something else.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t604.0
text: And the second thing is when we rolled out virtual trial applications, we started off with million faces for the data modeling.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t615.0
text: Now it has 100 million faces.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t618.0
text: So that algorithm and the engine is constantly improved over a period of time.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t623.0
text: And these are faces of actual customers, right?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t625.0
text: Actual customers, that's right.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t628.0
text: How does that beauty advisor work with the platform to get that feedback back into the system?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t635.0
text: I guess you can see what they actually ordered or what they chose or what they preferred.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t639.0
text: How do they get that input back in?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t641.0
text: I could tell, Sam, you're intrigued by the beauty advisor concept.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t647.0
text: We have very strict privacy laws.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t653.0
text: So in the store, when people are buying in the store, a lot of times we actually do not gather their personal information.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t661.0
text: But whereas when they're buying stuff from us online or social platforms where there is a log in and that kind of mechanism, then you have that information.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t671.0
text: So we know exactly what they bought and that information gets passed on.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t677.0
text: One of the things we're seeing, maybe it's a teaser of our new work to come out, but one of the things we're seeing is that the ability to understand and explain why an algorithm or an AI solution makes a recommendation or pulls out a particular insight or an action.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t697.0
text: Just the ability to sort of understand it rather than it's a black box helps organizations get a lot more adoption.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t706.0
text: I can speak in our supply chain world. In the last year, we rolled out an AI application to do our supply planning and demand planning.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t715.0
text: Before it was spreadsheets and those kinds of things.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t719.0
text: The moment we started using the AI application, we saw accuracy of 30 percent increase in our forecasting accuracy.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t728.0
text: Exactly.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t730.0
text: Some of my clients deliberately will settle for a less precise or less accurate recommendation so that they get the adoption going.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t741.0
text: Maybe they go for less precision to trade in a little bit of explainability or ability to override.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t748.0
text: And so that way at least people will begin to trust it more. I don't know whether you do something like that.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t754.0
text: I have not come across that, but that's a very interesting point.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t759.0
text: There's an angle there, too, that trades short-term and long-term, Shirvin.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t763.0
text: Let's say short-term, they take a compromise solution that isn't quite as good.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t768.0
text: And then they can come back in three months and say, hey, you overrode this and it didn't turn out as good as you thought, Sunshine.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t773.0
text: It's a longer game. It's not just each one-off decision that's short-term optimal.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t778.0
text: I did just that with my son, actually.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t781.0
text: He was going to a school dance and it was outside and all he had was a T-shirt on.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t786.0
text: And I said, wear a jacket. Where somebody says, no, I'll be fine.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t789.0
text: And I'm like, OK, you're going to get sick. And he got sick.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t793.0
text: And but hopefully he learned and he's like, Dad, you were right.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t798.0
text: And I'm going to make him listen to this podcast so that he knows now I've said to the whole world.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t804.0
text: Well, Shirvin, if you can drag your kids into this, I have to tell the anecdote that I this will shock you, Shirvin.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t809.0
text: But I track the time that my kids bus arrives every day.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t813.0
text: So I've got seven years worth of data now of what time that bus arrives.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t817.0
text: And so my next step is I'm predicting that. I'm trying to say, OK, what do we think today?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t822.0
text: Is today going to be an early days? Today going to be a late day? And then we can leave the house at the right time.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t827.0
text: But maybe we miss it someday. How's that working?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t831.0
text: How's that working out for you? I'll have to come back to that later episode and see how that plays out.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t838.0
text: But at least it's real time. You know, I'm trying to use the dog food of the things that we talk about on the show.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t844.0
text: Speaking of things we talk about on the show. How's that for a segue?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t847.0
text: So we have a segment where we ask our guests a series of rapid fire questions.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t852.0
text: And so the idea is you just hear this question and you give the first response that comes to your mind.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t857.0
text: And Shirvin, are you doing these today or am I doing them? No, I'm not because I don't have it in front of me.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t862.0
text: OK. All right. So, Somya, what's been your proudest A.I. moment?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t868.0
text: I think I already spoke about this, the fragrance application we built last year.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t873.0
text: In my current role, that is really my proudest moment. But before that, when I was in my previous job,

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t880.0
text: when we cracked the code on the computer vision, combining computer vision and with natural language processing to break down video processing,

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t890.0
text: because that's really the beginning days of A.I.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t892.0
text: When we were able to build something like that. So that was really cool.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t896.0
text: This is one thing I think it's the coolest thing about technology. Technology transcends industries.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t902.0
text: It almost doesn't matter what industry it is. Technology is so pervasive.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t906.0
text: So I feel so happy that we are able to apply the same technology for totally different applications.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t914.0
text: And that's the beauty of it.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t916.0
text: If you'd come up with something that topped the fragrance example, I was going to be super impressed. That was already a pretty proud one.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t923.0
text: So what worries you the most about A.I.?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t926.0
text: What worries me the most? I think it's the data privacy and the bias and those definitely and the tracking.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t936.0
text: One hand, when I use Google Maps, I like the functionality. I like what it does.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t941.0
text: But at the same time, I know Google knows exactly where I am at every second of the day. I don't like that.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t948.0
text: So the privacy and the data tracking piece. Absolutely. No problem.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t955.0
text: What's your favorite activity that involves new technology?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t959.0
text: Reading a book.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t961.0
text: Do you have any recommendations for us? You can extend your answer with a book recommendation.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t965.0
text: Recently, it's a very short book that I read, Night Diary.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t970.0
text: It's about a Pakistani girl during partition between India and Pakistan and this little girl who didn't talk, but wrote a diary every day.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t982.0
text: It was a really moving and interesting book. I really liked it.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t988.0
text: So what was the first career that you wanted when you were a child?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t992.0
text: Oh, I wanted to be a pilot, actually. You are one, right? Yes, I am.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1000.0
text: OK, so that's got a checkmark next to that one. You got that one.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1004.0
text: Well, I'm a more of a recreational pilot, but I actually wanted to be a professional pilot.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1011.0
text: But that's OK. I'll settle for recreational.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1014.0
text: I don't know. You've gone from AT&T to NBC to Estee Lauder.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1019.0
text: There's the next step. So what's your greatest wish for AI in the future? What are you hoping for?

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1028.0
text: This is more of an answer from my personal side of things, which is I just hope we use AI for environmental causes more, you know, better crops with better yields and water conservation.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1045.0
text: And I hope there is a lot more advances on that side of things as opposed to shopping or personalized experiences.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1057.0
text: That's particularly interesting coming from someone who's so interested in both of those aspects that you think that these other aspects might be even more promising.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1066.0
text: You're great talking with you. And these are fascinating applications. I think I think that most people who listen to this are going to remember the smell example.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1073.0
text: I mean, I think that just there's something very visceral about that. I think we'll connect with lots of people and spur some thinking.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1080.0
text: So thanks for taking the time to talk with us. We really enjoyed it. Thank you. Oh, thank you.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1085.0
text: This is so much fun. Thank you so much. And we can have some beauty advisors to work on, Sam, while we're talking.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1093.0
text: Since the podcast, nobody knows that I've got a face for radio.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1096.0
text: Tell them to bring all the shades and foundations and we'll see what they could do.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1101.0
text: You know, you should go to Estee Lauder.com and try the 30 shades of lipstick in 30 seconds and the foundation. See how it looks on you.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1109.0
text: I'll go with you.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1110.0
text: I'll just Google something shades of gray and then...

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1112.0
text: No, don't go there.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1114.0
text: Not that.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1115.0
text: Don't go there.

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1119.0

id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1127.0

title: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati
id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1135.0
text: Thanks for listening.

id: The Beauty of AI - Estee Lauder's Sowmya Gottipati-t1141.0
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and A.I.
